title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a skilled Frontend Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate should have experience with React, JavaScript, and modern web development practices.

title: Backend Developer
description: Backend Developer position for an experienced professional with Node.js and database expertise. You will be responsible for server-side application logic and integration of front-end components.
requirements: Knowledge of database systems (SQL and NoSQL)

title: Data Analyst
description: We're seeking a Data Analyst to interpret data and analyze results using statistical techniques. You'll acquire data from primary or secondary sources and maintain databases.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: DevOps Engineer needed to build and maintain CI/CD pipelines, automate deployments, and manage cloud infrastructure.
requirements: Experience with AWS, Azure, or GCP

title: UX/UI Designer
description: UX/UI Designer position for a creative professional to design user interfaces for web and mobile applications. You'll work closely with product managers and developers.
requirements: Knowledge of HTML/CSS is a plus
